channel.title: Equipment Spending on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Equipment Spending on FinanClub

item.title: AMAT
item.description: score:51 Chances: The semiconductor market is expected to grow by double digits in 2024. A jump in semiconductor equipment spending could supercharge this company that’s trading at an attractive valuation today. The company is undervalued on a DCF basis and has a predictable business.
